name: webpage-to-pdf
description: Convert webpages to PDF with custom options, extracting specific div content

scripts.svelte: node extract-links.js && node index.js svelte -c -o svelte-docs --combined-name svelte-documentation.pdf
scripts.kit: node extract-links.js && node index.js sveltekit -c -o sveltekit-docs --combined-name sveltekit-documentation.pdf
scripts.svelte:core: node extract-links.js && node index.js svelte -c -o svelte-core-docs --combined-name svelte-core-documentation.pdf --no-legacy --no-v4 --no-migration
scripts.kit:core: node extract-links.js && node index.js sveltekit -c -o sveltekit-core-docs --combined-name sveltekit-core-documentation.pdf --no-migration
